dk.pervasive.jcaf.rest.server
Class ContextServiceWebServer

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.Restlet
      org.restlet.Application
          dk.pervasive.jcaf.rest.server.ContextServiceWebServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, org.restlet.Uniform
public class ContextServiceWebServer
extends org.restlet.Application
implements java.lang.Runnable

A web server for RESTful communication with the current implementation of ContextService. It defines the url hierarchies binding to them the resource classes handling the requests.

Version:
1.0
Author:
mSpazzy

          Create a web service on the machine's current network address, if a network connection is available.
